modules.description: Provides binding and sequencing operations for working with signal values, enabling composition of asynchronous computations. Operates on values of type 'a t, supporting monadic-like patterns through custom operators. Used to combine and transform signals, such as summing two signal values or applying functions to their results.

Manages event-driven data flows using signal values that update in response to changes. It supports operations like mapping, filtering, and combining signals, along with subscription mechanisms. Used to synchronize UI elements with application state or handle real-time data streams.

manages asynchronous computations through signal values, offering binding and sequencing capabilities with custom operators. It works with values of type 'a t, enabling operations like combining signals or applying functions to their results. For example, it can sum two signals or map a function over a signal's value. The module supports complex signal transformations and event-driven workflows.
